```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(arsenal)
library(fastDummies)
```

```{r results='asis',warning=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("/Users/timvigers/Desktop/finalanalysisgroup.csv",na.strings = ".")
df$X.iab <- as.factor(df$X.iab)
levels(df$X.iab) <- c(0,1,2,3,3)
df$Hispanic..0.N..1.Y. <- factor(df$Hispanic..0.N..1.Y.)
df$Duration <- as.numeric(df$Duration)

df <- dummy_cols(df,select_columns = "X.iab")
df$X.iab_NA <- NULL

t1 <- tableby(Hispanic..0.N..1.Y. ~ Age_At_Diagnosis + Duration + 
                factor(Gender.F.0.M.1) + BMI + factor(GADA..0.N..1.Y.) +
                factor(mIAA) + factor(IA.2) + factor(ZnT8RW) + X.iab + 
                factor(X.iab_0) + factor(X.iab_1) + factor(X.iab_2) + factor(X.iab_3),
              df)
summary(t1)
```
